attributes.action: Disregard Petitions that would change EU Referendum rules.
attributes.additional_details:
Requesting the implementation of rules after the EU Referendum has taken place is unreasonable and unfair. Debating this issue in Parliament would be a waste of time and would only cause more divisions.

A Second EU Referendum would be a waste of resources and would cause more instability. Democracy has already been served.

A turnout greater than 75% is higher than the average turnout for a General Election. Implementing additional rules on referendums that do not have high turnouts is absurd.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, request that any Petitions that demand Change to EU Referendum Rules or may trigger a Second EU Referendum are either not debated in Parliament or are removed from the Parliament Petitions website.
